c74object.name: karma~
c74object.description: A dynamically lengthened varispeed record/playback looper with complex functionality.

discussion.p: The karma~ object is a dynamically lengthed varispeed sample-recording and playback object with complex functionality, which references the audio information stored in a buffer~ object having the same name.

objarg.name: buffername
objarg.digest: Name of buffer~ to be associated with the karma~ instance
objarg.description:
karma~ will not operate without an associated buffer~
The associated buffer~ determines memory and length (if associating a buffer~ of 0 ms in size karma~ will do nothing)
The associated buffer~ can be changed on the fly (see the set message) but one must be present on instantiation

objarg.name: channels
objarg.digest: Set the number of output channels
objarg.description: Set the number of output channels to use with the karma~ instance. Channel counts can be 1, 2 or 4. The number of audio outlets will change depending on this argument. The default is 1.

description.p: (get ready for) append recording to end of currently used segment (as long as buffer space available)
Type of interpolation used in audio playback. Available options: 0=Linear, 1=Cubic, 2=Spline Default Cubic
